synopsis.text: Buddhist monks save Sho Shishimaru, a psychic and member of the international mystical association Hermes Wings, from an attack by the Godom Empire. The monks believe Sho is the reincarnation of Buddha and the prophesied savior. In 202X, the Godom Empire, led by Tathagata Killer, uses advanced technology from a trading company run by Chan Leika to threaten world domination. Sho, with his mystical technology, is humanity's only hope against the Empire's mysterious technology. As the world faces political and military crises, Sho must confront the Godom Empire to save Japan and humanity from destruction, all while learning about the mystical laws governing the world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
